title: Common Primitives
description: Shared primitive types used across all OpenDataLayer schemas.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

locale.description: BCP 47 locale string (e.g. en-US, pt-BR, zh-Hans-CN).

percentage.description: A percentage value between 0 and 100 inclusive.

nonNegativeNumber.description: A number greater than or equal to zero.

positiveInteger.description: An integer greater than or equal to one.

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g. US, GB, DE).

languageCode.description: ISO 639-1 two-letter language code (e.g. en, fr, de).
